About Me

I'm a 4th year computer science student from Toronto Metropolitan University with a passion for building scalable web applications and working with large amount of data. My primary interests are in full-stack development and database management, and I've worked with technologies like Node.js, React, AWS and SQL. I'm a quick learner, team player, and problem-solver who's always up for a challenge. Currently, I'm seeking opportunities to apply my skills in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
